content: i always see patterns for the generic hand sanitizer bottles so i decided i needed to make one for all of my bath and body works hand sanitizers the strap length is easily customizable to fit your needs enjoy your new b&bw hand sanitizer holder connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
